td.content: shows significant small bowel congestion with necrosis, one adhesive band was found and lysed at the mid jejunum where it was fixed to the pelvic wall, a suspicious hard draining mesenteric lymph node was seen

td.content: s:a white male web designer aged 21 years presents with 12 days history of critical watery diarrhea. pt also reports critical denial of hematochezia, critical bloated feeling. o:Height 184 cm, Weight 61.4 kg, Temperature 36.7 C, Pulse 79, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 72, Respiration 17, Skin = warm, dry a:Small Bowel Cancer p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to oncology.
